module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: The Skrill fee structure is a competitive 1.2%+0.29 and 1%+0.29 for Instant bank transfer. * Fees apply to new merchants only. From 1st March 2021. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 375M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company, PayPal offers a range of simple, fast and secure solutions trusted by more than 375M users. With this free official module, benefit from our advanced commerce platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally.
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any set-up fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 88.7%* thanks to our mobile optimised solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay for their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more transactions you receive the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate measured by Comscore online panel, Q4 2017. Analysed shopping behaviour at 20 large merchant sites across categories, utilising its panel of 1 million US consumers.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.displayName: Boxtal Connect - 1st shipping solution in Europe
module.description: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Coli
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, Delivengo,UPS, DHL.
module.additional_description: 1. Multiply your conversion rate by 2 and boost your net salesWith our negotiated rates for the best carriers, with no contract and no minimum volume requirement, you offer the best delivery rates to your customers.Maximize your chances to convert by offering the 3 types of shipping expected by your customers: the economic collection point (Mondial Relay, Colis Privé Relais Colis ...), home delivery in 48H (Colissimo) or the express for the most hurried ones (Chronopost, UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL ...).The Boxtal Connect plugin can display the pick-up location map for carriers of your choice.And it's as simple as a checkbox in your backoffice! 2.  Save 1 hour each day in the management of your shippingsOur free Boxtal Connect plugin allows you to import your orders on boxtal.com in 1 click and manage your shipments in record time. No need to re-enter information, your customer’s choice of delivery is retrieved and the corresponding offers are listed. All you have to do is print all your transport labels and prepare your parcels.Boxtal helps you in the customs formalities for your international shipments: when filling an order, we display the right form and the necessary documents are generated at the same time as the labels. 3. Improve your customers' experience to build loyaltyWith Boxtal's efficient parcel tracking, you know where your parcels are located and you are informed of delays or delivery incidents! Your customers can view tracking statuses and receive shipping notifications if you turn on this option.Finally, you can generate return labels in just a few clicks in case your customers want to do so. 4. Security and reliability for you and your customersThe privacy and security of your data are important to you ? No worries: all the exchanges between your WooCommerce shop and Boxtal are encrypted! Nobody will be able to intercept your information or those of your customers.Ensuring the availability of our solution 24 hours a day is our priority: we constantly monitor our technical infrastructure to ensure that your business will not be disrupted.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell...
module.additional_description: The all-in-one tool : synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial

module.name: paybox
module.description: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole. You can easily install the solution on your PrestaShop online store to offer your customers a personalized shopping experience
module.additional_description: For several years, Crédit Agricole has been supporting thousands of French e-retailers with the Up2pay e-Transactions solution that meets their needs and those of their customers.With Up2pay e-transactions, you benefit from all the advantages of a well-known french bank:- One of the most attractive electronic banking commission rates on the market from the start of your activity- Payment of cash receipts into your account on D+1- A single contact person to meet your needs- After-sales support included (email and telephone) based in France Discover our commitment-free offer here : https://offres.ca-moncommerce.com/up2pay-e-transactions/up2pay-e-transactions-pour-prestashop/New : Up2pay e-Transactions Prestashop module is 3D Secure V2 compliant, in accordance with DSP2 regulation.[1] Up2pay e-Transactions is an offer subject to general and pricing conditions, reserved for professionals registered in France, excluding Marketplaces. The Up2pay e-Transactions offer requires a Crédit Agricole account agreement and the signature of an e-commerce card payment acceptance contract including the Up2pay e-Transactions services option.

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.
module.additional_description: Specialized in the multichannel collection (online/offline) of customer reviews, Verified Reviews measures, and analyses your customer's satisfaction so you can improve and drive your business decisions. We offer you a multi-tools platform for the management, follow-up, and an optimal diffusion of all contents collected and enable you to increase your reputation, visibility, and search engine ranking on the internet. Why should you choose Verified Reviews?1 - Fast and simpleLearn how to use the solution very quickly and start now collecting reviews from your clients. We can survey people up to 1 year after their orders. Our pre-built Verified Reviews integration with Oracle Commerce Cloud gets your site up and running with ratings and reviews and customer feedback very quickly, saving development time.2 - Website, product & offline reviewsWe collect 3 different types of reviews via one post-transaction email: website reviews where customers can evaluate your online shop; product reviews which mark specifically the purchases, and offline reviews if you want to show a grade for your offline shops. Everything in our solution can be tailored for your needs from emails, forms, campaign deadlines, and widget displays.3 - A global partnership with GoogleWant some stars in your SEM? Use our solution and display stars in your AdWords campaigns and PLA. Customers reviews will also allow optimization of your SEO as they produce active content on your product page.4 - A trusted certificateYour reviews are hosted in a Verified Reviews certificate with your name and logo on it. It gives more credit to them.

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices.
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

Thanks to the efficiency of our independent network, Satispay can offer the service to merchants with a pricing model that is both cheap and easy to understand. There are no sign-up costs or monthly fees, the sole charge for merchants is 1% on payments less than or equal to 10€ and 1% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€. Satispay contributes to management costs reduction by improving users’ conversion rate also thanks to the new QR code payments experience.

Stripe processes payments from 195 countries and millions of businesses. Even if a card is new to your business, there’s an 89% chance it’s been seen on the Stripe network before. Stripe supports PSD2 regulations in Europe and is SCA-ready. Stripe scans every transaction to dynamically trigger additional authentication only when required.  Rely on a trusted and secure payment provider. Stripe has been audited by a PCI-certified auditor[0] and is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1. This is the most stringent level of certification available in the payments industry. Our pricing is fully transparent. No setup fees, monthly fees, or hidden fees. You only pay for successful transactions. View pricing at our website[1]. Custom pricing available for companies with large payments volume or unique business models. Feel free to contact our Sales team[2]. [0] http://www.visa.com/splisting/searchGrsp.do?companyNameCriteria=stripe[1] https://stripe.com/pricing[2] https://stripe.com/contact/sales

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: riverbank
module.description: Do you need to finance your company growth but traditional banks have nothing to offer? RiverBank is a bank specialising in SME financing and a privileged partner of Prestashop, offering e-merchants a
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Do you need to finance your company growth but traditional banks have nothing to offer? RiverBank is a bank specialising in SME financing and a privileged partner of Prestashop, offering e-merchants a fast and easy online financing solution.
module.additional_description: Inventory financing, investment in your e-shop, recruitment? Finance your growth projects quickly with RiverBank Short Term Loan: no paperwork or time wasted thanks to a 100% digital solution and a dedicated contact person. RiverBank Short Term Loan is a short term, amortizing loan with constant monthly payments and no prepayment penalties, designed to meet your cash flow needs by giving you the flexibility that a bank overdraft does not offer. You can borrow from €3,000 to €25,000 over a maximum term of 12 months. You can perform one or more repayment schedule simulations, and it is free of charge and without obligation! This financing is available to all commercial companies and individual companies that are Prestashop customers with at least 6 months' activity and a turnover of more than €60,000.

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio - Translate your PrestaShop in over 50 languages
module.description: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling in other languages ​​from day one
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio allows you to automate the translation of your entire PrestaShop, you will save time and you can start selling in other languages ​​from day one.
module.additional_description: Facilitates international sales Translate your store automatically Glotio is much more than a simple automatic translator tool, is specialized in PrestaShop and it automatically translates many parts of your online store with no need to import/export texts.Multiply your sales, translating your e-commerce shop in more than 50 languages ​​and selling in many countries!  How does it work:Download and install our free module. In the PrestaShop marketplace you can find our certified module. Download it for FREE and create your account in just two minutes.We analyze your store for translatable content. Our simple wizard will guide you in a few steps through the process necessary for Glotio to track your PrestaShop for translatable material.Indicate which languages you want to translate your PrestaShop in. Once we know what content is available to carry out the translation, you can tell us which languages you want us to do it in. The first translation to the 1st language is FREE! Glotio updates your translations whenever you want. The languages that you have translated in our panel will be updated automatically or manually at the time you want, so that you always have your online store updated. KEY TOOLSFind and replace: You can always find some word or string of words that you prefer to replace by another. With this tool it will now be a piece of cake. Excluded words: You will most likely want to not translate certain words, such as brands or suppliers. You can automatically add them to the exclusion list. Smart Dictionary: No one knows the products you sell as much as you or your team, so you can teach Glotio how to translate certain words. What does that product provide you?• Boost your SEO: Glotio respects all the SEO of your default language, in this way you can start the organical positioning in any country you decided to sell using their native language.• International Marketing: Exportable data feed in all languages ​​to start marketing campaigns in new countries and multiply your visits. The translations are saved in your PrestaShop, so you can create a data feed in the different languages.• Increase the conversion ratio because you sell in the language of your customers.• Translate your entire online store (catalog, products, categories, attributes, characteristics, manufacturers, suppliers, attachments, etc.) into more than 50 languages ​​in record time.• Suitable for everyone. No programming knowledge or expert PrestaShop or HTML / CSS required.• You save time. Translate your online store quickly.• You pay only what you translate, with no monthly fees.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard. The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

module.additional_description: Grow is built on Tradedoubler's affiliate network of over 180,000 active affiliates. When you join Grow, we provide you with the tools needed to search for and recruit your own affiliates from our network, and also present your program to these affiliates so that they are able to access your marketing assets (banners, product feeds, voucher codes, etc.), and discover more about your company, its products/services and what your affiliate program offers them. Once your program is up and running, we take care of all the administrative tasks so that you can focus on what is most important – driving sales for your business. For all recorded activity, Grow presents you with useful statistics and information that provide insights on clicks, conversion rates, return on ad spend (ROAS), ad impressions, sales information, and much more. module.description: Automated value added tax and financial accounting for e-commerce – Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution: From automated data collection and calculation of your tax liabilities to VAT regist
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automated value added tax and financial accounting for e-commerce – Taxdoo offers you an all-in-one solution: From automated data collection and calculation of your tax liabilities to VAT registrations and fillings in other EU countries.
module.additional_description: With this module online merchants can maintain an overview of all VAT processes throughout the EU and UK. Once your existing Taxdoo account is connected with your Prestashop online shop, your transaction data is collected fully automatically and updated on a daily basis – manual uploads are not necessary. Through the automated evaluation and monitoring of the transaction data, our system recognizes the respective European VAT liabilities and clearly displays them in your client dashboard.Our local tax consultant network takes care of all your VAT registrations and corresponding VAT filings throughout the EU and UK. This means that you, as well as your tax consultant, can maintain an overview at all times as the VAT processed transaction data can be effortlessly transferred to financial accounting. Submitting VAT returns via One-Stop-Shop is also made easy with Taxdoo. At Taxdoo we provide you a comprehensive all-in-one solution!
